title: Smith Forefront 3 Helmet
content:
Since Smith first launched it in 2014, the Forefront helmet has been a leading product innovation and fan favorite among professional athletes and MTB enthusiasts since its debut. It was then updated in 2019 and today, we get the third iteration of this trail helmet with the Forefront 3 ($270).

The lightweight in-mold construction features a new further extended back shell that incorporates complete Koroyd® coverage for lightweight, energy absorbing and ventilated impact protection along with an updated Mips® Safety System. The Forefront 3 features 20 optimized vents that increase airflow by 25% over the previous model and maximizes consistent airflow through its AirEvac™ technology preventing fogging when worn with performance eyewear and goggles.

New on the Forefront 3 is the Smith Flexible Fit System featuring BOA®, providing micro-adjustable precision fit and customization.

Check ’em out in person at your local Smith dealer and online at SmithOptics.com
